name: Elasticsearch cluster status
description: This rule monitors the status of Elasticsearch cluster

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Check the network connectivity between nodes in your Elasticsearch cluster.
 2. Ensure that all nodes are running the same version of Elasticsearch.
 3. Verify that no nodes are in an unhealthy state by checking their logs and status pages.
 4. If the problem persists, consider increasing the number of replicas or data nodes in your cluster to improve performance and availability.
 5. Lastly, if none of the above steps resolve the issue, you may need to contact Elasticsearch support for further assistance.

For more information on troubleshooting Elasticsearch issues, you can refer to the official Elasticsearch documentation here: <https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/client/java-api/current/index.html>
